Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade is an adventure film directed by Steven Spielberg. It follows the adventures of Indiana Jones, a treasure hunter who uses his knowledge of history to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. The film stars Harrison Ford as Indiana Jones, Sean Connery as King Henry VIII, and Tom Sizemore as the famous outlaw Billy the Kid.
